module.name: Class of Service
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE, REQUIRES A LICENSE. Class of Service allows you to limit access, per extension, to feature codes, trunks, queues, ring groups, etc.
module.changelog: *15.0.15* FREEI-4572 modified the cos *15.0.14* Packaging of ver 15.0.14 *15.0.13* Packaging of ver 15.0.13 *15.0.12* Packaging of ver 15.0.12 *15.0.11* #FREEI-1071 updated changes for multi drag and long drag *15.0.10* Packaging of ver 15.0.10 *15.0.9* FREEI-1279 *15.0.8* bump *15.0.7* FREEI-392 Class of Service UI Performance Issue *15.0.6* FREEPBX-19427 *15.0.4* Fixing legacy restore *15.0.3* FREEPBX-19425 After adding/editing a Class Of Service entry the page is not redirecting to list page. *15.0.2* FREEPBX-19426 Reset Button under Class Of Service is not working *15.0.1* Add backup and restore
